mods.abstract: WSM's The Worry Hour, 1940-03-11, part 1. Personnel include David Cobb (announcer), 'Professor Phineas Fret' (host), Francis Craig (musical director) and his Orchestra, Snooky Lanson (vocalist, introduced as Snooky Landman), Jane Grant (vocalist), and Kitty Kallen (guest, vocalist) featured vocalist of Jack Teagarden's Orchestra. Held at WSM's Studio C. Sponsored by the National Life & Accident Insurance Company.

subject.topic: National Life & Accident Insurance Company, Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
